reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Lunette Menstrual Cup to Development Markets

description.narrative: Lunette as a company producing menstrual cups aims to get established in developing markets. The aim is to produce a business plan for 'Lunette Africa' a joint venture/subsidiary in East-Africa to reach various groups of girls /women in the target countri es (Kenya Tanzania Malawi Congo). Different pilots for different sectors customer groups and market segments will be conducted to gather essential information needed for the business plan. 1) Menstrual cups in the WASH-shopsPartner: A joint pilot with the Kenyan Red Cross and Finnish Red Cross. Aim: The cup would be part of product portfolio in WASH-shops water santation and hygiene shops in rural areas with hygiene-related products.2) Piloting MHM-package and training of trainersPartner: Fida International Aim: Reaching 85 schools in rural Tanzania. Piloting of Training of Trainers -concept as part of the Menstrual Hygiene Management -package. Developing a model for data collection.3) Market research of consumer marketsDeveloping a Lunette business plan with information on potential distribution channels for the middle class market testing and pricing will be asessed for Tanzania and Kenya. 4) Menstrual Cup for humanitarian context - piloting will increase knowledge of the usage needed instructions/training e tc. needed in the humanitarian context. 5) Collecting data from the users in Kibera the cup laboratoryThere is some research related to the use of the cup in the development context but not enough to to be certain of the usability of the cup and it's effec ts on eg. school enrollment and improved hygiene.Lunette will create a business plan and operate in a financially and ecologically sustainable way (packaging and training will be conducted locally increasing employment oportunities fo women). Through close cooperation with NGOs and targeting also the most vulnerable and marginalised groups of girls and women Lunette applies a human rights based approach to its operations.The activities are in line with national development plans of target countries and the Sustainable Development Goals (345 and 12).
